summary: Water texture replacement, includes new water, new waterfalls, new water effects, and isokus foam textures.
descriptionHtml:
Kman420\'s
----------

Another Water Texture Mod  (Skyrim) (Texture Replacer) v1.0
-------------------------------------------------

Just another alternate water texture, including waterfalls, foam, and splash effects. It is made by mixing svaalbard\'s water texture with the default texture to create a new look, and it uses isoku\'s water foam textures.


Installation
------------

Extract and move the data folder to your skyrim folder - click \"yes to overwrite\" if necessary - it will only overwrite textures in water and effect folders.



Credits
-------

Kman420

isoku\'s foam textures

svaalbard\'s water texture


Usage
-----

This mod is a mix of three peoples work, so for using it in your own mod you need to ask Me, isoku and svaalbard for permission first.



Kman420, isoku and svaalbard


isoku\'s  water foam textures: 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=711&navtag=file/images.php?id=711&tab=3

svaalbard\'s water mod
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=862
author: Kman420
